page.title: 13RELIGION
page.content: The main religion of this area is Chapel or Church of England. Moriah is the only Chapel found in this block. Moriah was originally built in 1827 and was rebuilt in 1865. Moriah is Baptist. There is a minister and the services are held at 10.30 a.m. (Morning Service), 11.30 a.m. (Sunday School) and 6.00 p.m. (Evening Service). The services are held in Welsh because Welsh is the first language of the area. The Baptism is carried out under the old hand worked water pump. The cemetary is in the grounds of Moriah. Some of the grave stones are nearly as old as the chapel. Other denominations have to commute to (Carmarthen) or large village.
